plist:
<<<<<<< HEAD
CFBundleDevelopmentRegion en CFBundleDisplayName Shift Scan CFBundleExecutable $(EXECUTABLE_NAME) CFBundleIdentifier $(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER) CFBundleInfoDictionaryVersion 6.0 CFBundleName $(PRODUCT_NAME) CFBundlePackageType APPL CFBundleShortVersionString $(MARKETING_VERSION) CFBundleURLTypes
CFBundleTypeRole Editor CFBundleURLSchemes
prefs
CFBundleVersion $(CURRENT_PROJECT_VERSION) LSRequiresIPhoneOS
NSCameraUsageDescription Scan Qr Codes with camera to quickly clock into site NSFaceIDUsageDescription To help users sign in faster and verify credentials NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescription The app uses your location to verify that you are physically at your assigned jobsite when clocking in or out. This ensures accurate timesheets and prevents errors or unauthorized clock-ins from outside the site. Your location is only used while the app is open or actively running in the background for clock-in purposes, and it is not tracked when the app is fully closed. NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription Your location may be tracked in the background, but only during company time when you are clocked in for work. The app does not track your location outside of work hours or when fully closed. NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription Your location is used to verify your presence at a jobsite for clock-in/out, and is only tracked during company time when you are actively working. NSMotionUsageDescription The app may use motion data to improve location accuracy, but only during company time when you are clocked in or out for work shifts. NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription Use For profile picture NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription used for profile pictures UIBackgroundModes
location
UILaunchStoryboardName LaunchScreen UIMainStoryboardFile Main UIRequiredDeviceCapabilities
armv7
UIRequiresPersistentWiFi
UIStatusBarHidden
UIStatusBarStyle UIStatusBarStyleDarkContent UISupportedInterfaceOrientations
UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait
UISupportedInterfaceOrientations~ipad
UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeRight UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait
UIViewControllerBasedStatusBarAppearance
CAPACITOR_DEBUG $(CAPACITOR_DEBUG)

dict.string: App uses this to verify login access
App tracks users location on clock in and stops tracking on clock out. User Info is only saved for clocked in users.
App tracks user location to obtain a knowledge of user where about for employer, dispatcher, or manager
App has a background functionality for the app to record location if clocked in.
App tracks location in background on clock In to provide employer knowledge of users time management and efficentcy
Camera is used to scan barcodes and used for profile pictures, the qr codes are one time uses, and profile images are saved.
Users will have the option to upload images to profile pictures.
Users can share library to upload pictures.
